Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Ss-arasin (UCSS1a, 2S=S, natural AMPs; Crustaceans, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)

Literature.Author: Anju A, Smitha CK, Preetha K, Boobal R, Rosamma P.2019
Literature.Title: Molecular characterization, recombinant expression and bioactivity profile of an antimicrobial peptide, Ss-arasin from the Indian mud crab, Scylla serrata

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of the peptide shows 97.6% similarity toArasin-likeSp.Activity: Recombinant rSs-arasin showed antimicrobial activity against S. aureus (IC50 20 uM), P. aeruginosa (IC50 40 uM), and E. coli (IC50 20 uM). It also inhibited human cervical carcinoma (HeLa, IC50 3.06 uM) and colon carcinoma (HT-29, IC50 2.9 uM) cell growth.Recombinant production:bacteria:Escherichia coli: expressed as His-tagged fusion protein. Updated Jan2020; 7/2021; 10/2023
